Title: Oodua Unity Group decries insecurity, calls for local government policing
Summary: Oodua Unity Group decries pervasive insecurity across Southwest Nigeria and parts of Kogi and Kwara States . It specifically called for local government and state policing .

Title: Siblings drown after heavy downpour in Ondo
Summary: Two teenage siblings have lost their lives in Ore, headquarters of the Odigbo Local Council Area of Ondo State . The incident occurred on Tuesday night when the two drowned in a river in the community during a heavy downpour .

Title: Cooking gas prices soar 33% in June – Report
Summary: Cost of refilling cooking gas in Nigeria surged in June 2025 . Prices for a 12.5kg cylinder rose by 33.52 per cent compared to the same month last year .

Title: So-Safe Corps arrests suspected thief, recovers stolen item in Ogun
Summary: The Ogun State Community, Social Orientation and Safety Corps, popularly known as So-Safe Corps, has apprehended a suspect in connection with a theft incident in the state . A statement issued in Abeokuta by the State Commander of the Corps, Dr. Dr. Fem Femi Ogun .

Title: She was a woman of integrity, Afenifere mourns Doyin Abiola
Summary: Dr Doyinsola Abiola died on Tuesday, August 5, 2025, at the age of 82 . The pan-Yoruba socio-political organisation, Afenifere, expressed deep sorrow over the passing of the veteran journalist .

Title: Admission: JAMB reels out measures for screening of candidates under 16 years
Summary: Joint Admissions and Matriculation Board, JAMB, has rolled out stringent procedures for screening of exceptional Unified Tertiary Matriculations Examination, UTME, candidates, who are still under the age of 16 years, for admission into Nigerian universities in the 2025/2026 academic session .

Title: NSCDC deploys armed squad for Osun-Osogbo festival
Summary: Nigeria Security and Civil Defence Corps deploys armed squad for Osun-Osogbo festival . NSCDC deployed an armed squad to provide security during the grand finale of the festival slated for Friday .

Title: Newcastle’s Isak told to train alone amid transfer interest
Summary: Isak has been linked with a British transfer record move to Liverpool . The 25-year-old has failed to feature in Newcastle's pre-season preparations . He has been told to train alone amid transfer interest from Liverpool .

Title: NGE mourns Doyin Abiola
Summary: NGE mourns Dr. Doyin Abiola, a trailblazing journalist and former Managing Director/Editor-in-Chief of the defunct Concord Newspapers, at the age of 82 .

Title: FG seeks partnership with Kuwait for affordable housing, urban devt
Summary: The Ministry of Housing and Urban Development, Arc. Ahmed Dangiwa has opened discussions with the Kuwait Fund for Arab Economic Development (KFAED), to explore partnership areas particularly in infrastructure development, with affordable housing as the main focus .
